content: Sitting in the car with Jeremy, the music and fans going, waiting for Kate and Chloe. Snoop Dogg comes on through shuffle. "Turn it up" JJ remarks. I comply and look back. "Is this Snoop Dogg?", he glances over at Chloe's empty seat knowing it's her favourite and sharing a fondness for her sister. "It's my favourite song now" he states. We share a look of empathy wondering if Chloe is ok getting ready to go.
